events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position on our tech team. Thank you for applying and showing interest in building innovative solutions with us.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department to ensure it is processed by the appropriate hiring managers.
A recruiter specializing in software development roles has been assigned to your application and will be your point of contact moving forward.
The initial screening interview focusing on your background, skills, and motivation was completed successfully with positive feedback.
Thank you for your prompt and detailed response to our screening questions, demonstrating enthusiasm and knowledge relevant to the role.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 2 PM UTC. The interview will assess your coding skills and engineering problem-solving abilities.
You completed your technical interview successfully, showing strong problem-solving skills and programming expertise as discussed with the panel.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 11 AM UTC to discuss cultural fit, benefits, and career growth opportunities.
The HR interview was completed and you expressed alignment with the company values and enthusiasm for joining the engineering team.
An official offer has been proposed for the Software Engineer position, including salary details, benefits, and start date options for your review.
We have received your positive feedback regarding the offer and are glad to confirm your enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
You have officially accepted the job offer. We are excited to welcome you aboard and look forward to your contributions as a software engineer.
Your onboarding process has started with introduction sessions, setting up development environments, and meeting your new team members.
The hiring process has been officially closed. You have been successfully integrated into the engineering team and are contributing to ongoing projects.
